argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_topontop | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( A C_ X -> A C_ X ) |
| 4 |  | #P_toponmax | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> X e. J ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssexg | |- ( ( A C_ X /\ X e. J ) -> A e. _V ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> A e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_resttop | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. _V ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. Top ) |
| 8 | 2, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. Top ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> A C_ X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dfss1 | |- ( A C_ X <-> ( X i^i A ) = A ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( X i^i A ) = A ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 13 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> X e. J ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elrestr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A e. _V /\ X e. J ) -> ( X i^i A ) e. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 6, 13, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( X i^i A ) e. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 15 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> A e. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_elssuni | |- ( A e. ( J |`t A ) -> A C_ U. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> A C_ U. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_restval | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A e. _V ) -> ( J |`t A ) = ran ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( J |`t A ) = ran ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( x i^i A ) C_ A |
| 22 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 23 | 22 | #P_inex1 | |- ( x i^i A ) e. _V |
| 24 | 23 | #P_elpw | |- ( ( x i^i A ) e. ~P A <-> ( x i^i A ) C_ A ) |
| 25 | 21, 24 | #P_mpbir | |- ( x i^i A ) e. ~P A |
| 26 | 25 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) /\ x e. J ) -> ( x i^i A ) e. ~P A ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) = ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) |
| 28 | 26, 27 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) : J --> ~P A ) |
| 29 |  | #P_frn | |- ( ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) : J --> ~P A -> ran ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) C_ ~P A ) |
| 30 | 28, 29 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ran ( x e. J |-> ( x i^i A ) ) C_ ~P A ) |
| 31 | 20, 30 | #P_eqsstrd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( J |`t A ) C_ ~P A ) |
| 32 |  | #P_sspwuni | |- ( ( J |`t A ) C_ ~P A <-> U. ( J |`t A ) C_ A ) |
| 33 | 31, 32 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> U. ( J |`t A ) C_ A ) |
| 34 | 18, 33 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> A = U. ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 35 |  | #P_istopon | |- ( ( J |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` A ) <-> ( ( J |`t A ) e. Top /\ A = U. ( J |`t A ) ) ) |
| 36 | 8, 34, 35 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
